## ExternalLinkFieldDefinition type

Represents an external link field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ExternalLinkFieldDefinition = TextFieldDefinition & {
    DefaultValue?: string;
    readonly UseForAutoClassification?: boolean;
};
```
